title: 明明设置了命令菜单的ID，还是打不开
author: lixiaoyuan09
txt_content:
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '&4&l纵&b&l横&a大&3&l陆--&a&l命令菜单'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 3

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  command: ''

  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or
  # set the item-id/data-value to 0)
  # In this case it will open with a book (right click)
  open-with-item:
    item-id: 421
    left-click: true
    right-click: true
#   data-value: 0

######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################复制代码

replies.author: lixiaoyuan09
replies.txt_content:
标题: 明明设置了命令菜单的ID，还是打不开RT：我设置了命令菜单ID为347  闹钟的菜单


 但是还是打不开


但是通过 cc open 方法可以打开！


而且每当我重载配置会出现


12.12 12:54:17 [服务器] 警告 at com.gmail.filoghost.chestcommands.command.CommandFramework.onCommand(CommandFramework.java:46)12.12 12:54:17 [服务器] 警告 at com.gmail.filoghost.chestcommands.command.CommandHandler.execute(CommandHandler.java:58)12.12 12:54:17 [服务器] 警告 at com.gmail.filoghost.chestcommands.[玩家菜单]ChestCommands.load([玩家菜单]ChestCommands.java:187)12.12 12:54:17 [服务器] 警告 at com.gmail.filoghost.chestcommands.config.yaml.PluginConfig.load(PluginConfig.java:45)


以下是配置：


#######################+                  +##   MENU SETTINGS    ##+                  +#######################menu-settings:  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED  name: '&4&l纵&b&l横&a大&3&l陆--&a&l命令菜单'  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED  rows: 3  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')  command: ''  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or  # set the item-id/data-value to 0)  # In this case it will open with a book (right click)  open-with-item:    item-id: 421    left-click: true    right-click: true#   data-value: 0#######################+                  +##       ITEMS        ##+                  +#######################




后面省去！

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content:
lixiaoyuan09 发表于 2015-12-12 12:53
item-id那里不还是421么...LZ是发错了还是自己粗心
